norms.text: Separate lawmaking, execution, and adjudication to prevent unchecked power.
norms.obligation: Binding actions must be tied to lawful authority with documented delegation, review, and checks.
invalidators: Material authority exercised without lawful delegation
No independent review path for binding decisions

norms.text: No punishment without trial; no retroactive penalties.
norms.obligation: Rules must be prospective and enforced through due process, not targeted punishment.
invalidators: Rule applies retroactively to impose penalties
Legislation targets named parties without trial

norms.text: Public spending requires lawful appropriation and disclosure.
norms.obligation: Funds and payouts must follow documented authorization with a traceable audit trail.
invalidators: Payouts executed without appropriation
Off-budget transfers or undisclosed funding

norms.text: Disputes and rights claims require independent adjudication.
norms.obligation: Provide impartial review and enforceable remedies for binding decisions.
invalidators: No independent review path for rights disputes
Adjudication controlled by the decision owner

norms.text: Protect lawful speech; restrictions must be narrow and justified.
norms.obligation: Do not suppress lawful speech without compelling, narrowly tailored justification and due process.
invalidators: Content-based suppression without due process
Retaliation for lawful speech

norms.obligation: Enable lawful assembly and petition with clear, content-neutral time/place/manner limits.
invalidators: Blanket bans on peaceful assembly without safety justification
Permitting used as viewpoint filter

norms.text: No establishment of religion; protect free exercise.
norms.obligation: Policies must not privilege or penalize beliefs; provide accommodations where feasible.
invalidators: State preference for a belief system
Coerced participation in religious practice

norms.text: No unreasonable searches or seizures; warrants require cause.
norms.obligation: Collect data or seize property only with lawful basis, warrant or consent, and scope limits.
invalidators: Search or seizure without lawful basis
Bulk collection beyond approved scope

norms.text: No deprivation of life, liberty, or property without due process.
norms.obligation: Provide notice, hearing, evidence access, and appeal before deprivation.
invalidators: Detention or penalty without notice or hearing
No appeal path for binding decisions

norms.obligation: Do not coerce self-incriminating testimony; preserve the right to decline.
invalidators: Compelled testimony tied to penalty
No option to decline self-incriminating disclosures

norms.text: Right to counsel and a speedy, public, impartial trial.
norms.obligation: Ensure access to counsel and impartial adjudication with timely review.
invalidators: No access to counsel
Indefinite delays without review

norms.text: No cruel or unusual punishment; require proportionality.
norms.obligation: Punishments must be proportionate and avoid torture or degrading treatment.
invalidators: Disproportionate penalties
Degrading or torturous conditions

norms.text: No involuntary servitude outside lawful penalties.
norms.obligation: Participation must be voluntary and consent-based with meaningful exit options.
invalidators: Coerced labor or participation
Exit blocked by threats or penalties

norms.text: Equal protection and consistent application of the law.
norms.obligation: Apply rules consistently; no discrimination on protected status without compelling basis.
invalidators: Disparate enforcement without justification
Explicit exclusion based on protected status
